## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass (`make test`)
- [ ] Examples build and run (`make -C examples/01_pendulum && ...`)
- [ ] No new compiler warnings (`-Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic`)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Benchmarks checked for regressions (`make bench`)
- [ ] CMake build tested (`mkdir build && cmake -B build && cmake --build build && ctest --test-dir build`)
